content:
As an AI language model, I cannot predict the exact programming preference of Digital Television. However, I can say that producing content that explains complex topics in simpler terms is a popular approach in the television industry, and many channels have successfully used it to educate and entertain their audiences. In today's fast-paced world, viewers are increasingly interested in shows that blend entertainment with informative content, and programming that delves into complex topics in a simplified manner can be a great source of learning.

Moreover, for most TV networks, creating such educational content is usually in line with their mission statement. Many broadcast networks have produced educational programming to supplement the mainstream content that they offer. Therefore, if you think there's a need for such shows in the programming lineup of Digital Television, it's definitely worth suggesting it to them, and they may be interested in producing this kind of content.
